org.eso.ias.plugin.filter

Class AverageByTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eso.ias.plugin.filter.FilterBase
      • org.eso.ias.plugin.filter.AverageByTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class AverageByTime
extends FilterBase
    AverageByTime produces a new Double value by applying the arithmetic average of the samples received in the specified time frame.
    Author:
    acaproni
